snippet.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero Opening - HD (The Geofront)
snippet.description:
The animated opening for the Geofront's localization of The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero. See progress updates at https://geofront.esterior.net/

Video editing: Choojermelon, DrCullenPHD, _seaPancake
Direction: KillScottKill

Website: https://geofront.esterior.net/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GeofrontTeam

#TheLegendOfHeroes #TrailsFromZero #TheGeofront
